0100000010101111 0100101001101101 0 -> sum: 1000101100011100, cout: 0
1110001101000011 0010010010100100 0 -> sum: 0000011111100111, cout: 1

0100011100010111 1011000000100000 1 -> sum: 1111011100111000, cout: 0
0001110001000100 0110000111111110 1 -> sum: 0111111001000011, cout: 0
0000000000000000 0000000000000000 0 -> sum: 0000000000000000, cout: 0
1111111111111111 1111111111111111 1 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 1
0000000000000000 1111111111111111 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0
